summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1551, for the improvement of Twelfth Avenue Smith, in the City of Seattle, from Jackson Street to Norman Street, by planking the same with four inch by twelve inch planks sixteen feet long, under Ordinance No. 16710 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
